head.supplied: 19/1/95 ¶ ¶ By this week's post, esteemed Doctor, quite a few algae are dispatched to you again that Miss Hussey of Port Elliot has collected recently in Encounter Bay. ¶ ¶ Permit me the remark that...

div.p: Mit dieser Wochen Post, geehrter Herr Doctor, gehen wieder etliche Algen an Sie ab, welche Miss Hussey von Port Elliott in der Encounter-Bay gesammelt hat in letzter Zeit.

Erlauben Sie mir die Bemerkung, dass ich von Miss Hussey's Algen niemals Exemplare hier behalten habe, so dass die Staats-Sammlung hier bisher nichts von ihr enthält. Wenn Sie daher irgend überzählige Einzeln Arten zurück senden könnten, so wären die Algen der Encounter Bay in der Melbourne-Sammlung doch auch theilweise vertreten, was ja auch für geographische Verbreitung wichtig ist. Vielleicht haben Sie auch etwas Anderes von mir Erhaltenes für Rücksendung abzulassen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
By this week's post, esteemed Doctor, quite a few algae are dispatched to you again that Miss Hussey of Port Elliot has collected recently in Encounter Bay.
SA.

Permit me the remark that I have never kept specimens of Miss Hussey's algae here, so that up to now the State collection here contains nothing from her.
Jessie Hussey's algae are represented in MEL, at least some of which were distributed by Agardh as 'Algae Muellerianae'; for example, MEL 608415 and MEL 691940 and presumably sent to M by Agardh. Therefore if you could send back some surplus separate species, the algae of Encounter Bay also would be partly represented in the Melbourne collection, which certainly is also important for geographical distribution. Perhaps you also have something else from me, retained for return, to send back.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
